products.description: Global payment processing that accepts cards and local payment methods online, in mobile apps, and across borders. Helps businesses of all sizes collect revenue, improve authorization rates, and reduce cart abandonment. Fast to integrate and scales globally.

Subscription and recurring billing platform that automates invoicing, usage tracking, and revenue collection. Helps SaaS and service businesses manage subscriptions, reduce churn, and speed up billing operations. Flexible models and built-in reconciliation support growth.

Prebuilt, hosted Checkout that simplifies payment capture and reduces development time for web and mobile. Helps merchants launch secure, conversion-optimized payment flows quickly with localization and fraud protections. Ideal for teams needing fast, reliable checkout.

Commerce platform Connect for marketplaces and platforms to onboard sellers, split payments, and manage compliance. Helps platforms handle payouts, tax reporting, and KYC at scale while reducing operational overhead. Built to support complex, multi-party flows.

Radar fraud prevention that detects and blocks fraudulent payments in real time using global data signals. Helps merchants lower chargebacks and protect revenue while preserving legitimate customer conversions. Continuously learns to improve detection across regions.

Terminal in-person payments with Stripe hardware and software for card-present retail and hospitality. Helps stores and restaurants unify online and offline payments, speed checkout, and simplify reconciliation across channels. Secure, PCI-ready and enterprise-ready for large deployments.

Treasury embedded financial accounts and cash-management services to hold, move, and manage funds. Helps platforms and marketplaces offer bank-like capabilities—balances, payouts, and cash operations—without traditional banking overhead. Scales with your product and customer base.

Issuing platform to create and manage virtual and physical cards for employees, customers, or partners. Helps companies control spending, automate expense workflows, and launch branded payment programs with spend rules and real-time controls. Flexible across geographies and program sizes.

Capital lending that provides fast working capital based on Stripe processing data and sales performance. Helps merchants access funding for inventory, growth, or cash flow needs with simple repayment tied to revenue. Streamlines financing so businesses can act quickly on opportunities.

Tax service that automates sales tax, VAT, and GST calculation and reporting across jurisdictions. Helps businesses collect the correct tax at checkout, simplify filings, and reduce compliance risk as they expand internationally. Integrates into payment and billing workflows to save time.

Identity verification to confirm customer identities using document checks and signals for KYC and fraud prevention. Helps platforms onboard users faster while meeting regulatory requirements and reducing bad actors. Designed for global verification needs and regulatory coverage.

Invoicing tool to create, send, and track professional invoices with embedded payment options and reminders. Helps freelancers, agencies, and small businesses get paid faster, automate collections, and sync billing with accounting processes. Supports both one-off and recurring invoices.

Sigma (analytics) provides SQL-based reporting and customizable dashboards that turn payment data into insights without external BI tools. Helps finance and operations teams analyze revenue, disputes, and customer behavior to make faster decisions. Scales with transaction volume and reporting needs.

Elements are customizable UI building blocks for creating branded payment forms that stay secure and compliant. Helps product teams craft tailored checkout experiences quickly while reducing developer work and maintaining PCI controls. Flexible for web and mobile, suitable for small teams to enterprises.

Atlas startup toolkit for incorporating companies, opening bank accounts, and accessing legal and tax guidance. Helps founders launch faster with step-by-step support, resources, and community guidance that reduce administrative friction. Designed to accelerate early-stage scaling internationally.

Climate initiative that lets businesses fund certified carbon removal projects directly from transactions or budgets. Helps companies offset emissions and support impactful climate work while meeting sustainability commitments. Easy to integrate and provides transparent reporting for stakeholders.

Payment Links offers a no-code way to create sharable payment pages and checkout links for quick sales. Helps small businesses, creators, and teams collect payments instantly via email, chat, or social media without integrations. Fast to set up and track payments centrally.

Payouts service to send funds to bank accounts, debit cards, and platforms on flexible schedules worldwide. Helps marketplaces, platforms, and businesses pay sellers, contractors, and customers reliably while simplifying reconciliation and multi-currency handling. Built for global scale and compliance.

Refunds streamline issuing returns and managing money-back requests while updating accounting and dispute records. Helps merchants handle customer returns quickly, preserve trust, and reduce manual refund work and reconciliation headaches. Integrated with payments and reporting to simplify operations.

Apps & App Marketplace offers prebuilt integrations and partner apps that extend Stripe with accounting, analytics, tax, and platform tools. Helps teams accelerate integrations, add capabilities without custom build, and discover vetted solutions with curation and reviews to simplify selection.

Professional Services provides consulting, implementation, and integration support for complex Stripe deployments. Helps enterprises plan architecture, accelerate launches, and optimize payment and financial workflows with expert guidance, project delivery, and hands-on implementation support.

Financial Connections links bank accounts and financial data to power account verification, payouts, and insights. Helps platforms speed onboarding, reduce fraud, and enable direct debit or identity checks with secure, user-consented bank connections. Improves reconciliation and payment flows.
